name: NBA All-Star Challenge
overview: Jam it home with 27 of the hottest NBA" All-Stars in the ultimate test of b-ball skill: ONE-ON-ONE! Downtown or in the paint, driving offense and intense "D", take it to the hoop with the likes of Patrick Ewing, Clyde Drexler, Chris Mullin, Hakeem Olajuwon and Dominique Wilkins. Player stats, realistic courtside sound effects and 5 blistering ways to play: ONE-ON-ONE - FREE THROW CONTEST - 3 POINT SHOOTOUT - H.O.R.S.E. - NBA ALL-STAR TOURNAMENT Don't be denied...take the NBA ALL-STAR CHALLENGE'"!!!
